imdb.title: Meitantei Conan
imdb.plot: The cases of a detective whose physical age was chemically reversed to that of a prepubescent boy but must hide his true mental development.

episodes.plot: A remake of the older story, where Conan, Kogoro and Ran came to Moonlight Island and investigated a series of strange deaths related to the death of a musician in the past and his piano.

episodes.title: The Company Dissolution Party
episodes.plot: Kaitou Kid disguises as Kazuha to steal the Fairy Lip. Meanwhile, Heiji wants to confess his feelings to Kazuha (who in fact is Kid in disguise). Will they succeed in their missions?

episodes.title: The Automatic Tragedy: Part 1
episodes.plot: A young man called Fusaya Oide appears in front of the Mouri detective agency, wanting to hire Kogoro to solve the mystery of the death of his father, Raita Oide.

episodes.title: The Automatic Tragedy: Part 2
episodes.plot: Kogoro and Conan discover the identity of the mysterious woman and the truth of this tragedy.

episodes.title: Murder at the Townhouse Café
episodes.plot: Conan, Ran, and Sonoko are in a townhouse cafe when later, the manager Satoshi Tomita is found unconscious on the floor.

episodes.title: Makoto Kyogoku the Understudy: Part 1
episodes.plot: Conan, Ran, Sonoko, Masumi, and Makoto are walking on the street after watching a movie when they find a man taking a woman hostage. Fortunately, Makoto knocks down the criminal to later see Shigematsu Tomioka telling that all of the scenes was a drama shooting. Since the actor was unconscious, Makoto is chosen as the understudy. They later meet an actor, an actress, a production assistant and a makeup artist. The actor, Saiya Tokuzono is so annoying because he made a joke by making the actress, Nanako Jinmei to sign an autograph using an electric pen. When Makoto and...

episodes.title: The Skilled Hawk Hides His Crimes
episodes.plot: When Conan, Ran and Kogoro go on a trip to the mountains, they make a stop at a village where they investigate the murder of a falconer.

episodes.title: Intrigue at Smile Village
episodes.plot: When Conan, Genta, Mitsuhiko and Ayumi visit a retirement home, Smile Village, the group discovers that the owners of the facility are planning to scam some of the residents.

episodes.title: The Frying Pan of Hatred
episodes.plot: Following a demonstration of a new frying pan, it's manufacturing company's president is found stabbed to death in his office. When another man apparently commits suicide and seems to have been the killer, Conan becomes suspicious.

episodes.title: The Broken Goldfish Bowl
episodes.plot: A company president who hired Kogoro to protect him is murdered along with his secretary and the investigation reveals that there's more to the case than meets the eye.

episodes.title: The Opposite Shore Case
episodes.plot: Conan and the Detective Boys stumble upon Takagi and Chiba on a stakeout where they are watching a ransom hand off to a kidnapper who has taken a 5 year old child, hoping to arrest the kidnapper.

episodes.title: Dragging The Detective Around
episodes.plot: Kogoro accompanies a woman who hires him to help her track down a stolen brooch when the robber sends her clues in letters. Along the way, they are set upon by attempted murders and suspicious accidents.

episodes.title: An Encouragement of the Perfect Crime
episodes.plot: Sato and Takagi seek help from Kogoro when they investigate the work of a criminal mastermind. When they discover that he has apparently arranged to have someone killed by explosion, they rush to identify the target and stop it.

episodes.title: The Scarlet School Trip (Bright Red Arc)
episodes.plot: Temporarily restored to his normal size, Shinichi joins Ran and their friends on a trip to Kyoto. There, he meets Keiko, an old actress friend of his mother, who has received a strange code from a friend who committed suicide years ago.

episodes.title: The Scarlet School Trip (Crimson Love Arc)
episodes.plot: As Keiko's friends keep turning up dead, Shinichi homes in on the killer, and his relationship with Ran continues to develop.

episodes.title: The Ventriloquist's Illusion: Part 1
episodes.plot: The ventriloquist Tengan puts on a show about a ventriloquist who becomes posed by his dummy and murders his wife. Tengan asks Kogoro to watch him so the show performance doesn't become a reality. Kogoro turns him down. The next morning, Tengan's wife is killed. But is the dummy actually responsible?

episodes.title: The Ventriloquist's Illusion: Part 2
episodes.plot: Ventriloquist Tengan's wife was bludgeoned to death with a trophy. Affected by multiple personality disorder, Tengan confesses he killed her but is not aware. His apprentice becomes a suspect but Conan feels something is off. But the truth will prevail!

episodes.title: The Inn of the Kamaitachi: Part 1
episodes.plot: Conan, Ran, Kogoro, Heiji, and Kazuka visit an inn in the mountains of Nagano. Heiji acquires a phone of a figure carrying a scythe running across the water of the outdoor bath. It is rumored to be a supernatural creator known as a kamaitachi.

episodes.title: The Inn of the Kamaitachi: Part 2
episodes.plot: As more incidents arise stirring up the idea of the demon kamaitachi, Bonzo is murdered. Of course, Conana notices the oddities of the crime scene. Somehow he and Heiji must prove that the culprit is a human being who has somehow made it possible to walk on water and commit murder.

episodes.title: The Darkness of the Prefectural Police: Part 1
episodes.plot: Kogoro, Conan, and Ran visit the Kawanakajima battlefield where they run into Detective Yamato and his associates of the Nagano Prefectural Police. During their tour, they visit the Chikumagawa River where a severed head pops up to the surface, only to be that of one of the Nagano detectives.

episodes.title: The Darkness of the Prefectural Police: Part 2
episodes.plot: After Detective Takeda is murdered. Lieutenant Kano is found dead from hanging in his home. Inspector Morofushi reasons that he was hanged after being strangled. Later, the culprit reveals his plan to kill three more people. Who is next on the list? And can Conan and the others unmask the murderer?

episodes.title: The Darkness of the Prefectural Police: Part 3
episodes.plot: As the things progress and more murders are committed. More and more evidence appears to name Inspector Yamato as the serial murderer. As his associates begin to turn on him Yamato leaves to go search for the killer alone. But a deliberate trap is set for the culprit. But is it Yamato or is he the true target of the true culprit?

episodes.title: The Shadow Approaching Amuro
episodes.plot: Conan and the rest of the Detective Boys try to put to rest their suspicions of a man who visit the Poirot Cafe numerous times with his focus on their friend, Amuro. They follow the man but Amuro confront him first. The man runs away and the team loses him. Later at the cafe, they encounter the man face to face with Amuro. Everything is revealed in a shocking conclusion.

episodes.title: Bekapon's Bleeding Service
episodes.plot: An employee at a supermarket gets some threat calls and so he hires Mori to look into the matter. Mori tells him that the calls are nothing but a prank. However, someone who is mistook for the employee is murdered the next day.

episodes.title: Detective Takagi On the Run in Handcuffs
episodes.plot: While transporting a minor criminal, Detective Takagi attaches himself to the criminal using a pair of handcuffs but due to the circumstances they fall into a lake and now must survive together.

episodes.title: Three First Discoverers: Part 1
episodes.plot: A woman is found hanging from the ceiling of her home. Initially it feels like a suicide but Conan suspects foul play. Shuichi Akai tells Conan about Rum, whom Haibara knows as the second-in-command of the Black Organisation.

episodes.title: Three First Discoverers: Part 2
episodes.plot: Three suspects are brought in for questioning based on the eyewitness account of the boy who was a friend of the dead lady. Each of them says that they found her dead already but Conan feels something's not right.

episodes.title: Bodyguard Kogoro Mouri
episodes.plot: A famous actress hires Mori to be his bodyguard and also to investigate and find out who has been trying to kill her.

episodes.title: The Secret of Missing Young Lady
episodes.plot: Ayumi witnesses a man carrying the body of his wife and putting it in his car. She thinks that this man has killed her and calls in the Detective Boys to help.

episodes.title: Inseparable Couple's Strategy
episodes.plot: A writer drops from the fifth floor of a building and dies. After some investigation, police rules out suicide, murder and accident. There are no leads. However, Conan acts on a hunch.

episodes.title: Fantasy Young Lady's Confused Deduction
episodes.plot: A young lady fears that her crush has been kidnapped or worse, killed. Conan agrees to help her find him but eventually uncovers the plan for the robbery of a jewel store.

episodes.title: The Moving Target
episodes.plot: A person falls from a building and was about to hit another man when Conan saves him. Initially it was suspected to be an attempted suicide until some facts uncover and now the police are looking for a murderer.

episodes.title: Detective Boys' Deduction Battle in a Locked Room
episodes.plot: A body is found in a pool which is in an area with only one locked entry. Conan tries to figure out how this person landed here. Also, how and where did he die?

episodes.title: The Missing Scream of Munch
episodes.plot: A private collector wants to put up a show of Munch's three fine paintings. While in transportation, 'Scream' is lost and everybody starts losing their mind.

episodes.title: The Manipulated Great Detective: Part 1
episodes.plot: Mori goes undercover to infiltrate a gang of thieves but he is blackmailed by the head of the organization to investigate the murder of his son.

episodes.title: The Manipulated Great Detective: Part 2
episodes.plot: After the robbery goes sideways, the whole gang and Mori come back to the gang's hideout. Mori is put on a clock to determine the head's son's killer. If he fails, Ran dies.

episodes.title: Detective Boys vs Detective Elderlies
episodes.plot: Conan and the kids meet an elderly detective team which consists of their older counterparts. This team reports a murder and helps the police solve it but Conan has his own suspicions.

episodes.title: The Missing Angel in a Mirage
episodes.plot: An artist is found dead on a beach. All the signs point to accident but Conan senses foul play.

episodes.title: A Scarlet Prologue
episodes.plot: A kindergarten teacher is found injured near the stairs in a park. She is a good friend of the FBI investigator, Jodie Starling, who also starts helping the police. Problems arise when Bourbon, of the Black Organisation, also gets involved in the investigation.

episodes.title: A Scarlet Pursuit
episodes.plot: Bourbon and Conan go toe to toe in the investigation of the wounded teacher. They figure who the culprit is but Conan feels that Bourbon has a bigger agenda at play.

episodes.plot: Conan and his friends go to a house in the mountains for vacations. The boyfriend of one of the owner of the house dies and Conan has to figure out which of the three sisters killed him.

episodes.title: Ai Haibara Imprisonment Case
